intro: +3 years of experience. Computer Engineer and FullStack Developer. My focus is React and Node.js.
bio: I am an advanced student of the {{degree}} degree, with a strong interest in development and new technologies. For 3 years, I have been working as a fullstack developer using React and Node.js, which has allowed me to gain valuable experience in diverse projects and strengthen my skills in both frontend and backend development. Currently, I am looking to specialize in Cloud technologies to expand my knowledge and skills in the development and deployment of scalable and efficient applications. I am always looking for opportunities to apply my knowledge in real-world scenarios and continue learning and growing in the field.
degree.description: The Computer Engineering program at the National University of Tucumán provides comprehensive training that covers everything from basic sciences to the latest technologies in software, hardware, and networks.
school.title: Electronic Technician
school.description: I earned my Electronics Technician degree during high school, providing a strong foundation for a career in electronics.
course.title: Java Full-Stack Developer
course.description: Completed course in 1 year, acquiring knowledge in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Java, React, and Bootstrap. Currently working as a React/Node developer, applying the skills and knowledge gained to create dynamic and interactive user experiences.
project1.title: Portfolio
project1.description: Personal portfolio website built with React and Tailwind CSS. Features a responsive design and showcases my skills, projects, and experience.
project2.title: SharyCo
project2.description: Participated in the development of SharyCo's web application. My tasks included maintenance, implementing new requirements and verifying proper functionality.
project3.title: Google Cloud Server
project3.description: Created and configured a personal server on Google Cloud to learn and specialize in cloud computing and deploy my personal projects.
job1.title: Fullstack Developer
job1.description: I worked as a fullstack developer, creating web applications for clients using React and Node.js. I collaborated with a team of developers and designers to deliver high-quality products that met client requirements and expectations.
contact description: If you have any questions or just want to say hello, feel free to contact me directly at bustosrme@gmail.com or using the form below. I'm here to help!
